x1x2x3x2x4x2x5x6x2x7 x8x9x10x11x12x11x13x14x15x9x16x17x14x18x19x20x21x16x22x8x14x8x1x16x23x24x12x25x25x25x25x25x13 x26x4x27x28x2x6x29x7x30x31x3x3 x6x2x30x18x27 x9x5x3x4 x5x2x4x7x30x30 x1x2x3x4x5x6x7x3x8x9x3x7x5x10x11x3x5x6x12x10x3x7x9x3x13x6x11x3x9x14x3x15x16x6x17x16x15x16x7x11x3x18x19x13x10x3x20x8x10x21x10 x14x22x10x23x3x8x24x9x25x8x9x26x14x2x27 liability 1 denies liability liability 2 liability 3 x28x2x3x4x5x6x7x3x8x10x21x10x14x22x10x13x3x5x6x12x10x3x17x10x10x14x3x24x6x16x13x10x8x27x3 defence 1 copy on computer defence 2 wireless router security unknown defence 3 defence 4 x29x2x3x4x5x6x7x3x6x24x10x3x7x5x10x3x22x16x24x22x19x30x13x7x6x14x22x10x13x3x18x19x13x10x3x20x22x16x24x22x19x30x13x7x6x14x22x10x13x23x3 x8x24x9x25x8x9x26x14x2x27 circumstance 1 circumstance 2 circumstance 3 circumstance 4 wireless paragraph security letter sent yes username corresponds to infringer x31x2x3 x10x25x24x10x13x10x14x7x6x7x16x9x14x3x3x18x10x14x7x10x24x3x16x14x3x2 representation 1 lawdit representation 2 x2x3x7x5x10x24x3x21x15x6x13x3x18x21x15x6x10x14x7x10x24x3x16x14x3x2x27 undeliverable lawyer acting yes paying by instalments proceedings issued and aborted flagged for court proceedings issued x2x3x6x13x16x14x3x18x25x15x10x6x13x10x3x7x16x22x3x9x14x10x2 diarise for action in 1 on 2 further actionx19x25x10x24x12x16x13x9x24x3x9x30x30x10x14x7x13x16x7x16x6x7x16x9x14x3x5x24x9x14x9x15x9x11 x6x26x8x16x7x3x15x10x7x7x10x24 do we want to pursue this person 3 our chances of litigation success 3 overall litigation rating 3 x16x24x22x19x30x13x7x6x14x22x10x13 x26x4x2x4x2x30x29x27x30x2x29x29x2x30 x22x2x6x5 x6x14x2x30x14x4x2x2x6x29x2x30x2x3x2x5x6x2 x27 x2x30x3x4x27x30x3x27x4 x2x6x5 x27 x29x30x30x29x5x29 x29x2 x2x6x5 x27 x29x30x30x5x29x5x29 x29x2 x27x5x30x2x5x2x3 x29x300x30x29x5x29 x29x2 x27x5x30x2x5x2x3 x29x300x30x5x29x5x29 x29x2 x29 x2x30x30x29x5x29 x29x2 x29 x2x30x30x5x29x5x29 x29x2 x20x5x2 x2x4x2x30x30x6x27x5x3 x4x2 x5x2 x2x4x2x30x30x5x6x27x5x3 x4x2 x161x2x4x30x6x29 x5 x26x4x29 x30x2x5x29x30x5x30x5x27x30x3x4x29x2x4x30x4x2x27x5x2 x4x2 x29x30x6x4x14x6x22x2x30x2x6 x5x2 x29x30x29x27x30 x5x30x26x26x30x5x2x291x27x48 x29x30x2x4x27x5x30 x29 x10x25x24x10x13x10x14x7x6x7x16x9x14 x17x27 x6 x29x27x4 x17x1x14x161x30x17x27x6 x26 x18 x16 x29 x29 x27x5x30x3x4 x2x5 x22x4 x5x30x29x5x4x147 x6x12x16x8x10x14x22x10 x9x17x26x30x9x5x29x5x6x2x7 x16x27 x29x2x30x9x5x29x5x6x2x7 x26x2x4x6x2x5x29x2x30x4x2x7 x20x2x4x5x2x7
